alert.note: Alert for Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 22 at 10:41AM EST until February 23 at 1:56AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers... Raccoon Creek near Granville. Mill Creek at Evendale. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Raccoon Creek near Granville. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.5 feet, Water breaches the TJ Evans bike trail west of Granville and floods storage buildings near the Granville water plant. Water also approaches the property of the Denison University power plant. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 8.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 14.7 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
